project.description:
Following API: -suiteName, -configName, -firmwareVersionMain, suiteName - name of the predefined suite, e.g. Sanity440Lync_basic configName - name of the predefined session config, e.g. Sanity440LyncConfig firmwareVersionMain - name of the firmware file which should be test, e.g. UC430HD_2.0.3.16 1. Before running, put a firmware version to \\isr0214-34401\firmwares (isr0214-34401 = 10.59.0.87) , also it is need to put relevant firmwares for other phones. If tested firmware is UC440HD_3.0.0.65, it is need also to put all other available firmwares: UC430HD_3.0.0.65, UC420HD_3.0.0.65, UC405_3.0.0.65 (note that for 405 ther is no 'HD' in firmware name); 2. Example for run: tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl -suiteName Sanity440Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC440HD_3.0.0.65.img
Should work on 10.59.1.46 - ippAuto

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ConfigName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Sanity or Full - The name should be Sanity440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl or Full440LyncConfig.ACDev.tcl

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ATA_Home
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: if [ "$PC2RUN" == "ippSanityTest01" ]; then C:/IpPhoneAutomation/ModifeidIterations/ATA else C:/IpPhoneAutomation/ATA (this is suitable for IGS)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ServerType
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ServerType == Lync for the lync running ServerType==IGS for IGS running ServerType ==NonLync for NonLync running (currently non implemented )

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FeatureName
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the suite without config name , model , server type and ".suite" If suite file name is "Sanity450Lync_Calendar.suite" feature name will be "Calendar"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!c:\cygwin\bin\bash --login -i
echo sleep $DelayTime sleep $DelayTime
User=$artifactory_user:$artifactory_pass
net use if ! net use | grep -iqE "OK .* z:.*Firmwares"; then echo confige again Z: ---------------------- net use z: /delete net use z: "\\\\10.59.0.87\\Firmwares" fi
line=$(curl -s http://${COMPUTERNAME}/index.php/status/show.xml | tail -1) echo $line cd ${ATA_Home} tclsh AtaExec.tcl -stop all
ARTIFACTORY=https://artifactory/api/storage/ipp-release/com/ac/ipp/SFB/$BuildRelease
if [ "$BuildRelease" == "3.0.1" ]; then BoardsList="440HD 430HD 420HD 405HD C450HD" else BoardsList="440HD 430HD 405HD C450HD 450HD 445HD " fi
if [ "$ServerType" == "IGS" ]; then BoardsList="445HD C450HD 450HD" # model=445 ARTIFACTORY=https://artifactory/api/storage/ipp-release/com/ac/ipp/SFB/$BuildRelease fi
DOWNLOAD=$(echo $ARTIFACTORY | sed 's|api/storage/||')
echo LASTBL: $LASTBL if [ "$LASTBL" = "None" ]; then LASTBL=`curl -ks -u $User -X GET $ARTIFACTORY | grep uri | cut -d'"' -f4 | grep -v https | cut -c 2- | sort -Vr | head -1` echo Find: $LASTBL fi
if [ "$LASTBL" == "" ]; then echo Not find LASTBL - Exit with error exit 1 fi
date
for BOARD in $BoardsList; do
# In case of 445HD_IGS, the image name is without the _IGS #imageName=UC$(echo $BOARD | sed 's:_IGS::')_$LASTBL.img
imageName="UC"$BOARD"_"$LASTBL".img" buildN=$LASTBL if [ "$BuildRelease" == "master" ]||[ "$BuildRelease" == "release/3.4.3" ]; then if [ "$BOARD" == "440HD" ] || [ "$BOARD" == "430HD" ] || [ "$BOARD" == "405HD" ]; then if [ "$ServetType" == "IGS" ]; then imageName="UC"$BOARD"_"$LASTBL"_IGS.img" buildN="${LASTBL}_IGS" else imageName="UC"$BOARD"_"$LASTBL"_SFB.img" buildN="${LASTBL}_SFB" fi fi fi echo Searce $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD/$imageName...
if curl -ks -u $User -X GET $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD | grep -q ${buildN}.img\"; then echo -- Check if $imageName exist in z: if [ ! -f z:/$imageName ]; then echo ---- Download $imageName to z: echo curl -ks -u $User -X GET $DOWNLOAD/$LASTBL/$BOARD/$imageName --output z:/$imageName curl -ks -u $User -X GET $DOWNLOAD/$LASTBL/$BOARD/$imageName --output z:/$imageName
# checksum the transfered file. If not equel, exit with error and the job will retry after 30 seconds checkSum1=$(curl -ks -u $User -X GET \ $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD/$imageName | \ grep md5 | head -1 | cut -d\" -f4) checkSum2=$(md5sum z:/$imageName | cut -d" " -f1) echo checksum: $checkSum1 and $checkSum2 if [ "$checkSum1" != "$checkSum2" ]; then echo CheckSum is not equel.. abort rm -f z:/$imageName exit 1 fi
else echo ---- $imageName already exist.. skip the download... fi else echo Not exist in Artifactory: $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD... fi done
date # To solve the "Process leaked file descriptors" problem # Or: BUILD_ID=dontKillMe nohup ./yourStartScript.sh & # see: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17024441/process-leaked-file-descriptors-error-on-jenkins BUILD_ID=dontKillMe export $BUILD_ID
modelImage=UC${model}HD_${LASTBL}.img if [ "$BuildRelease" == "master" ]; then if [ "$model" == "440" ] || [ "$model" == "430" ] || [ "$model" == "405" ]; then if [ "$ServetType" == "IGS" ]; then modelImage=UC${model}HD_${LASTBL}_IGS.img else modelImage=UC${model}HD_${LASTBL}_SFB.img fi fi fi echo Check if file z:/$modelImage if [ -f z:/$modelImage ]; then echo cd ${ATA_Home} cd ${ATA_Home} echo tclsh AtaExec.tcl \ -configName ${ConfigName}${model}${ServerType}${UserType}Config.tcl \ -suiteName ${ConfigName}${model}${ServerType}_${FeatureName}.suite \ -firmwareVersionMain $modelImage -rerunFailedAuto 1 -forceUpgrade 1 \ -jenkinsChildId ${BUILD_NUMBER} -jenkinsParentId ${BUILD_PARENT}
tclsh AtaExec.tcl \ -configName ${ConfigName}${model}${ServerType}${UserType}Config.tcl \ -suiteName ${ConfigName}${model}${ServerType}_${FeatureName}.suite \ -firmwareVersionMain $modelImage -rerunFailedAuto 1 -forceUpgrade 1 \ -jenkinsChildId ${BUILD_NUMBER} -jenkinsParentId ${BUILD_PARENT} fi
exit $?

#!c:\cygwin\bin\bash --login
date echo PS list pslist -t
#ID=`grep "session id:" ${WORKSPACE}/${IMAGENAMES}.${PHASE}.txt | cut -d: -f2` ID=$(curl -s http://localhost/index.php/status/getSessionId/${REGRESSIONTYPE}${MODEL}${ServerType}_${SUITENAME}.xml | tail -1 | sed 's:.*<Session-Id>::; s:</Session-Id>.*::')
echo Find $ID
if [ "$ID" == "" ]; then exit 1; fi
cd ${ATA_Home}
echo MESSAGE=Aborted >> $WORKSPACE/properties.txt echo ID=$ID >> $WORKSPACE/properties.txt echo CONFIGNAME=${CONFIGNAME} ATA-${ID} >> $WORKSPACE/properties.txt
echo Stop Ata $ID if [ "$ID" != "NotFound" ]; then tclsh AtaExec.tcl -stop $ID fi date
